sentences.en: Crocodile not fish, reptiles of vertebrates, ZuLong extant insects are the offspring.
sentences.cn: 鳄鱼不是鱼, 属脊椎动物爬行虫纲, 是祖龙现存唯一的后代.

sentences.en: extant remains of the ancient wall
Few of the manuscripts are still extant.
It contains the earliest documents extant on the life, teaching, crucifixion, and resurrection of Jesus.
sentences.cn: 它包含着现存的关于耶稣的生平, 教导, 受难和复活的最早文献.

sentences.en: It is actually the earliest extant commentary edition of Chinese traditional opera.
sentences.cn: 它实际上是现存最早的中国戏曲评点本.

sentences.en: Many insects were pollinators before other flying animals were extant.
sentences.cn: 在其它能飞的动物出现之前,许多昆虫已经是授粉者了.

sentences.en: Of the 500 - odd canvases extant , roughly 250 date from 1930 to 1939.
sentences.cn: 在现存的500多张油画中, 大约250张是1930至1939年间的作品.

sentences.en: Rig Veda is acclaimed as the oldest extant literature available to humans.
sentences.cn: 《梨俱吠陀》作为对人类有用的现存最古老文献而被称赞.

sentences.en: Some of Washington's letter are extant.
sentences.cn: 华盛顿的有些信件仍然被保留着.

sentences.en: Some of Washington's letters are extant.
sentences.cn: 华盛顿的若干函札现仍存在.

sentences.en: The extant and the development trend of metallic foams research are prospected.
sentences.cn: 最后对粉体发泡法生产泡沫金属的发展前景做了前瞻性展望.

sentences.en: The oldest extant document is dated 1492.
sentences.cn: 现存最古老的文献出自1492年。

sentences.en: This is the extant manuscript of the poem.
sentences.cn: 这是现存的该诗的原稿.

sentences.en: This is the only picture extant of a stereognathus.
sentences.cn: 这是仅存的一幅始祖鸟画像.

sentences.en: Two fourteenth-century manuscripts of this text are still extant.
sentences.cn: 这个文本仍有两份14世纪手抄本存世。

sentences.en: Veda is acclaimed as the oldest extant literature available to humans.
sentences.cn: 梨俱吠陀》作为对人类有用的现存最古老文献而被称赞.
